name: RPG In A Box - Selling Items Sample Project
name_original: RPG In A Box - Selling Items Sample Project
description:
Sample WIP project for selling items in RPGiaB. That's literally all the player can do here is sell items to an NPC.

This is not an executable. This an RPGiaB project and will require the RPGiaB software (I think it should work in the Demo).

Functionality is pretty solid but it's slow.

Play around with it, use it to your heart's content. If you find a way to make it faster/better please share with the community.
